verses.text: Mamin Jehová, a t'ayach tzin col in b'a, mocab' in kan t'a q'uixvelal uuj.
Colin, colinel t'a yol sk'ab' eb' ajk'ool yajoch t'ayin, yujto tojol ach. Ab' val tas svala', tzin a colani.
Ochanh venhuloc icha junok nhaq'ueen b'aj syal in colan in b'a. Ala' to tzin colchaji yujto icha in cuartel aji, icha in nhaq'ueen aji.
Ach in Diosal, colinel t'a eb' chuk, t'a eb' milumcham anima yet' t'a eb' ixtum anima.
Mamin Jehová Vajalil, toxonton yip ach in k'ool yictax t'a in quelemal.
Yictax ix in alji t'a ix in nun, a t'ayach svik' vip. Ha ach ix in ak' aljoc. Ol ach in b'itejnhej.
Tzijtum mach sat sk'ol yilan tas tzin ik'ani, palta ach in Diosal, anhej t'ayach tzin col in b'a.
Masanil tiempo, swal wach' lolonel t'ayach yuj snivanil elk'ochi.
Manh in a patiquejeli, yujto icham vinaquinxo. Manh in actejcani yujto manhxalaj vip.
Ha eb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin sgana in smilanchamoc, smol yetb'eyum eb', slajtian sb'a eb' t'a in patic.
Syalan eb': Pechec, yamec. Manhxo ayococh Dios yet'oc, manhxalaj mach ol colanel ticnaic, xchi eb'.
Ach in Diosal, manh najatoc tzach el t'a in tz'ey. Cotanh t'a elanhchamel, ochanh ved'oc.
Ha eb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin, chamocab' eb' yuj q'uixvelal. Ha eb' tz'alan tas chuk t'a in patic yic tzin yixtan eb' yalani, malajocab' tz'ajkan yelk'och eb'.
Palta, a inxo tik ach in Diosal, ayachnhej och yipoc in k'ol t'a junjun rato. Ol ach in b'itej yet' in tzalajk'olal.
Masanil tiempo ol valel yab'ixal a tojolal yet' a colval, wach'chom max nachaj vuuj smasanil.
Mamin Jehová Cajalil, a juntzanh tastac te satub'tac ix a k'ulej, ha' ol in b'itej. Ol valel ab'ixal to a achnhej tojol ach.
Ach in Diosal, yictax in quelemal, ix in a k'ayb'ani. Anhejtona' valanel juntzanh tastac nivac b'ob'ilcan uuj ticnaic.
Ach in Diosal, wach'chom icham inxo, sacxo xil in jolom, palta manh in actejcani yic ol yal valanel yab'ixal a poder t'a eb' toto ol aljoc.
Ach in Diosal, yelxo val te niwan a tojolal icha snajatil satcha’anh. Nivan tastac ix a k'ulej. Malaj junok mach icha ach tik.
Wach'chom tzijtum tas ix in ik'ani yet' yaelal ix ak' t'ayin, palta ol in ak'xi pitzvoc. Ol in ik'xiq'ueta t'a sjulal lum lum.
Te niwan ol aj velk'och uuj, ol ak'anpax snivanil in k'ool.
Ha inxo tik, ol ach in b'itej yujto tzaq'uelk'och tas tzala'. Ol vak'an yuj diosal t'ayach yet' te' arpa yet' te' chinhb'il. Ach in Diosal, co Diosal ach a onh aj israel onh tik.
Ol ach in b'itej t'a tzalajk'olal, yujto ix in a colo'.
Ol valel a tojolal t'a masanil q'uinal. Ha eb' ix nib'an to ay tas ix in ik'ani, ix telvi eb', ix te q'uixvicanel eb'.
